MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. Our team are working to repair an underground cable fault outside 7 Newmarket Street however due to difficult digging conditions, we now expect supplies to be restored by 1:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:29pm on Saturday 17th April 2021
